LanguageData.CE_GrenadeLauncher.label: grenade launcher
LanguageData.CE_GrenadeLauncher.description: A simple, locally produced break-action grenade launcher, capable of firing a variety of different projectiles.
LanguageData.CE_GrenadeLauncher.tools.0.label: stock

LanguageData.CE_DisposableRocketLauncher.label: disposable rocket launcher
LanguageData.CE_DisposableRocketLauncher.description: A lightweight single-use anti-tank launcher. Designed to provide soldiers in the field with a compact anti-armor weapon.
LanguageData.CE_ThermalBoltProjector.label: thermal bolt projector
LanguageData.CE_ThermalBoltProjector.description: A medium-velocity, low-trajectory fire support system deployed by mechanoids. While inaccurate and slow-firing, it remains a potent weapon against static targets.
LanguageData.CE_ThermalBoltProjector.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.CE_FlareGun.label: flare gun
LanguageData.CE_FlareGun.description: An ancient, single-shot flare gun, used for signaling or illumination. Loaded from the breech, its barrel is too thin to fire anything but flares.
LanguageData.CE_FlareGun.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.CE_FlareGun.tools.1.label: muzzle
LanguageData.CE_MechanoidMinigun.label: minigun
LanguageData.CE_MechanoidMinigun.description: A multi-barrel machine gun. It looks menacing with its long barrels and once it starts firing it fires very fast. Where most self-loading guns are powered by the energy from the gunpowder, the minigun uses an electric motor powered by the mechanoid it's mounted on to rapidly cycle cartridges through the weapon.
LanguageData.CE_MechanoidMinigun.tools.0.label: barrel
